Key Match Events: Burkina Faso beat Burundi 2-0 in Burundi on Sunday
Post-Match Reflections: Burkina Faso became the first qualifiers for the 2025 African Cup of Nations
Miscellaneous Highlights: Burkina Faso joined hosts Morocco in the 24-team tournament
Senegal are in second place with seven points from three matches and will also qualify if they win away to Malawi on Tuesday
Others: Burundi have three points from four games and Malawi none from three
The top two in the 12 qualification pools advance to the finals that will be played from December 21 next year to Jan. 18, 2026
